db:abstract.db:para: List of ABIs that packages of a single target are built for.

db:article.db:para: List of ABIs that packages of a single target are built for.
This property was introduced in Qt 6.3.

db:note.db:para: This property is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This property is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: By setting the QT_ANDROID_ABIS property for a target, it's possible to control the list of ABIs that the single target packages are supposed to be built for. The supported ABIs are armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a, x86, x86_64. The property only affects targets created with qt_add_executable().
